import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; /** * Filter popup component * Props: * - visible (bool) * - onClose() * - onApply(filters) * - initialFilters */ export default function FilterPopup({ visible, onClose, onApply, initialFilters = {} }) { const [filters, setFilters] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", department: "", ...initialFilters, }); useEffect(() => setFilters({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", department: "", ...initialFilters }), [initialFilters, visible]); if (!visible) return null; return (
Filter users
setFilters({ ...filters, firstName: e.target.value })} />
setFilters({ ...filters, lastName: e.target.value })} />
setFilters({ ...filters, email: e.target.value })} />
setFilters({ ...filters, department: e.target.value })} />
{/* backdrop */}
); }
